spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent adherence to the complex layout. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are highly accurate. Minor deductions for missing internal swings on doors and slight proportion distortion in the Alfresco/Garage wall boundary.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms accounted for. No hallucinated structures. Walls are clearly visible, roof effectively removed, and the model is correctly isolated on a dark neutral background with no text or measurement overlays.

furniture_mapping.notes: Impressive block-style furniture mapping. Kitchen island, theater sofa, and car in garage are perfectly placed. Deducted 1 point for the missing dining set in the Alfresco area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Nearly perfect low-poly execution. Maintains flat shading and simplified geometry throughout. Deducted 2 points for subtle shadows that are slightly more defined than 'flat shading', though they remain non-dramatic.

detected_errors.description: Missing outdoor dining furniture in the Alfresco area relative to the 2D floor plan.
Minor wall alignment deviation where the Garage meets the Entry corridor.
